verses.verse: And I, brothers, <S%G80><s%> when I came <S%G2064><s%> to you, came <S%G2064><s%> not with excellency <S%G5247><s%> of speech <S%G3056><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> declaring <S%G2605><s%> to you the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
For I determined <S%G2919><s%> not to know <S%G1492><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing among <S%G1722><s%> you, save <S%G1508><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and him crucified. <S%G4717><s%>
And I was with you in weakness, <S%G769><s%> and in fear, <S%G5401><s%> and in much <S%G4183><s%> trembling. <S%G5156><s%>

And my speech <S%G3056><s%> and my preaching <S%G2782><s%> was not with enticing <S%G3981><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of man's <S%G442><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> but in demonstration <S%G585><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and of power: <S%G1411><s%>
That your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> should not stand <S%G1510><s%> in the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but in the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

However, we speak <S%G2980><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them that are perfect: <S%G5046><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> not the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of the princes <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> that come <S%G2673><s%> to nothing: <S%G2673><s%>

But we speak <S%G2980><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in a mystery, <S%G3466><s%> even the hidden <S%G613><s%> wisdom, which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> ordained <S%G4309><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> to our glory: <S%G1391><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of the princes <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> knew: <S%G1097><s%> for had they known <S%G1097><s%> it, they would not have crucified <S%G4717><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of glory. <S%G1391><s%>

But as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Eye <S%G3788><s%> has not seen, <S%G1492><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> ear <S%G3775><s%> heard, <S%G191><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> have entered <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has prepared <S%G2090><s%> for them that love <S%G25><s%> him.

But God <S%G2316><s%> has revealed <S%G601><s%> them to us by his Spirit: <S%G4151><s%> for the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> searches <S%G2045><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, yes, <S%G2532><s%> the deep <S%G899><s%> things of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> the things of a man, <S%G444><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in him? even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> the things of God <S%G2316><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> but the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> we have received, <S%G2983><s%> not the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but the spirit <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of God; <S%G2316><s%> that we might know <S%G1492><s%> the things that are freely given <S%G5483><s%> to us of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> things also <S%G2532><s%> we speak, <S%G2980><s%> not in the words <S%G3056><s%> which man's <S%G442><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> teaches, <S%G1318><s%> but which the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> teaches; <S%G1318><s%> comparing <S%G4793><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> things with spiritual. <S%G4152><s%>

But the natural <S%G5591><s%> man <S%G444><s%> receives <S%G1209><s%> not the things of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> for they are foolishness <S%G3472><s%> to him: neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> he know <S%G1097><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> they are spiritually <S%G4153><s%> discerned. <S%G350><s%>
But he that is spiritual <S%G4152><s%> judges <S%G350><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, yet <S%G1161><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> is judged <S%G350><s%> of no <S%G3762><s%> man. <S%G3762><s%>

For who <S%G5101><s%> has known <S%G1097><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that he may instruct <S%G4822><s%> him? But we have <S%G2192><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
